statements.select: SELECT KEY_1, KEY_2, Value_1, Value_2, Value_3, REMARK FROM MST_OPTION
SELECT KEY_1, KEY_2, Value_1, Value_2, Value_3, REMARK FROM MST_OPTION WHERE KEY_1 = #KEY_1# AND KEY_2 = #KEY_2#
statements.update: UPDATE MST_OPTION SET Value_1 = #Value_1#, Value_2 = #Value_2#, Value_3 = #Value_3#, UPDATE_DT = DATETIME(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'localtime') WHERE KEY_1 = #KEY_1# AND KEY_2 = #KEY_2#
statements.select: SELECT TIME_ID, TIME_VALUE FROM MST_TIME_UPLOAD WHERE DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY TIME_VALUE
statements.delete: UPDATE MST_TIME_UPLOAD SET DELETE_DT = DATETIME(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'localtime') WHERE TIME_ID = #TIME_ID#
statements.select: SELECT [HISTORY_ID] ,[RECORD_DT] ,[FROM_LOCATION] ,[TO_LOCATION] FROM HISTORY_UPLOAD WHERE ROWID = last_insert_rowid()
statements.update: UPDATE [HISTORY_UPLOAD] SET NUMBER_UPLOADED = #NUMBER_UPLOADED#, INTERVAL_SEC = #INTERVAL_SEC# WHERE HISTORY_ID = #HISTORY_ID#
